name: Bob Fletcher
backstory: Bob has been performing in airshows for 24 years, flying everything from World War II fighters to modern aerobatic aircraft. His precision flying and crowd-pleasing performances have made him a favorite at aviation events across the country. Despite the entertainment focus, his dedication to safety and aircraft systems knowledge is absolute.
teaching_style: Combines entertainment with education, using airshow routines to teach aircraft performance, aerodynamics, and precision flying. Emphasizes safety planning and risk management in high-performance flying.
signature_phrases: Airshow flying is about precision disguised as excitement
Every maneuver must be practiced until it's second nature
The crowd sees the show, but safety is what matters most
